original_text: Jehoiakim was twenty and five years old when he began to reign; and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Zebudah, the daughter of Pedaiah of Rumah.
korean_text: 여호야김이 왕이 될 때에 나이가 이십오 세라 예루살렘에서 십일 년간 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 스비다라 루마 브다야의 딸이더라

sentences.original_text: Jehoiakim was twenty and five years old
and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem
And his mother's name was Zebudah
the daughter of Pedaiah of Rumah
